previous.excerpt:
Since the first manned spaceflight, mission patches were sewn to astronauts
suits to represent their mission goals. Every single spaceflight has had their
own custom-made, crew-designed mission patch to be worn in space and I see no
reason why our mission aboard the GME should be any different. So,…
previous.title: On the eve of our GME space flight, I present each & every one of you space cadets your very own mission patch 🚀💎🤲

Dear Autists,



BB is looking good for a couple reasons.

 1. Rumor of settled lawsuits with FB in BB's favor. Should have details within
    two weeks.
 2. BB just sold phone patents to Huwawei. This frees them from their smartphone
    burdens and gives more capital for their EBIT.
 3. BB's CEO…
next.title: You guys know that BB's CEO gets a massive bonus if share price hits $16 and $20 right?

localize.title: 你们知道，如果股价达到16美元和20美元，BB的CEO就会获得大量奖金吧？
localize.the_new_excerpt:
亲爱的自闭症患者，



BB看起来不错，有几个原因。

 1. 传闻与FB的官司已经解决，对BB有利。应该会有细节内
    两周。
 2. BB刚刚把手机专利卖给了华为。这让他们从智能手机的
    负担，给他们的EBIT带来更多的资本。
 3. BB的CEO...

localize.title: 你們知道，如果股價達到16美元和20美元，BB的CEO就會獲得大量獎金吧？
localize.the_new_excerpt:
親愛的自閉症患者，



BB看起來不錯，有幾個原因。

 1. 傳聞與FB的官司已經解決，對BB有利。應該會有細節內
    兩週。
 2. BB剛剛把手機專利賣給了華爲。這讓他們從智能手機的
    負擔，給他們的EBIT帶來更多的資本。
 3. BB的CEO...
